name: Corn on the Cob with Chili Lime Butter
description: Sweet and savoury corn with a hint of smokiness and lime.
preparation: Cream together butter, Chili and Chili Lime Sansel in a small mixing bowl. Set aside.
Fill Multipurpose Pot with cold water and bring to a boil. Add corn and cook for 3â€“5 minutes, or until tender. Drain.
While still warm, brush corn with prepared Chili Lime Butter and season with Salt. Serve immediately.
tips: Create delicious herb butters using any of your favourite Herb and Spice Blends.
